title: Al Mada
text: Al Mada ( "al-Madā") is a daily <a href="Arabic">Arabic</a> <a href="newspaper">newspaper</a> published in Baghdad, Iraq. The founder of the daily which was first published on 5 August 2003 is Fakhri Karim, an Iraqi former <a href="communist">communist</a>. The publisher is Al-Mada Foundation for Media, Culture and Arts. The paper has an independent political stance.
